markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diving Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=3056) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Inventor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=408" />
<trait label="Modification" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=410" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 26</row>

**Prerequisites**
[armor innovation](/Innovations.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You've modified your armor with fins, rotors, and other devices to make it easy for you to move through the water, plus mechanical gills that can help you extract breathable air from water. While wearing your armor innovation, you can breathe underwater and gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed.
name: Diving Armor
